articles.title: Apple Denies Blocking ‘Fortnite’ From EU Stores in Epic Dispute - Bloomberg
articles.description: Epic Games Inc. asked a court to force Apple Inc. to approve access to the hit game Fortnite in the US App Store, the latest tussle in a long-running feud over Apple’s control of game distribution revenue.
